title: Charming Historic House in Swidnica's Heart with Modern Comforts
description: Step into timeless elegance with this lovely house located in Swidnica's renowned Historic Center. Meticulously maintained, this 165 sqm property seamlessly blends historic character with modern day functionality, offering three spacious bedrooms and three full bathrooms. Thoughtfully designed, the home includes dedicated home office space and an underground garage, combining practical living with tranquil period charm. Secure, comfortable, and ready for your family's memories, it is move-in ready for its first-time owners.
neighborhood_description: Set in the heart of Swidnica, the Historic Center neighborhood is celebrated for its centuries-old architecture and a peaceful suburban vibe. Enjoy exceptional convenience, being well-connected by public transport and highways that make daily commutes and city exploration effortless. Within a stroll you’ll discover local boutiques, quaint cafes, and a vibrant cultural scene, making urban amenities easily accessible close to home.
lifestyle_benefits: Quick access to local dining and shopping
target_buyer: This property is perfectly tailored for first-time buyers seeking a refined, secure dwelling with both character and coverage. Anyone desiring modern comforts within a historic, walkable area will find this the ideal entry into homeownership.
market_positioning: Positioned as a rare opportunity in Swidnica's Historic Center, this house offers an appealing balance of historic architecture and up-to-date convenience. Highly differentiated through its unique period-style aesthetics and enhanced home security, it is a standout option in the upper-mid range market for those stepping into their first home.
